response.body:
pull_request_approval_rules:
- target_branches:
  - master
  rules:
  - approval_mode: require_any
    regex: "- \\[x\\] Yes - this change impacts customers"
    approving_team_handles:
    -  CAB - Foo
    -  CAB - Bar
    labels:
    - needs-cab-approval
  - regex: "- \\[x\\] Yes - this change impacts documentation"
    approving_team_handles:
    -  CAB - Documentation
    labels:
    - needs-doc-approval
  alerts:
  - regex: "- \\[x\\] Yes, this is an emergency release."
    slack_webhook_secret: "slack_platform_team_secret"
    slack_message: "emergency change merged <PR_LINK>"
